# easytable

`easytable` helps you create publication-ready tables with clear
defaults and minimal code. Its [Design
Philosophy](https://github.com/alfredo-hs/easytable/blob/main/DESIGN_PHILOSOPHY.md)
is simple:

1.  Easy to use.
2.  Easy to read.

## Basic Function and Installation

To install `easytable`, you need `devtools` installed.

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("alfredo-hs/easytable")
```

After installation, everything is **easy**.

``` r
library(easytable)

model <- lm(mpg ~ wt, data = mtcars)

easytable(model)
```

For more information about package functions, see the [Penguins
Tutorial](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/articles/penguins-tutorial.md).

## What You Get

- One function for routine workflows:
  [`easytable()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/easytable.md)
- Word/HTML and LaTeX output paths
- Control-variable indicators (STATA-like)
- Optional export to `.docx` and `.csv`

## On what can I use it?

As a workhorse package, `easytable` currently supports the
bread-and-butter classes in R:

- `lm`
- `glm`

Other model classes (including `plm`) will be added in later releases.

## For Contributors

Please feel free to contribute by forking the GitHub repository and
trying the package.

- [Design
  Philosophy](https://github.com/alfredo-hs/easytable/blob/main/DESIGN_PHILOSOPHY.md)
- [Developer
  Roadmap](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/articles/developer-roadmap.md)
- [Testing
  Protocol](https://github.com/alfredo-hs/easytable/blob/main/tests/README.md)

# Package index

## Main Function

- [`easytable()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/easytable.md)
  : Create publication-ready regression tables

## Renderer Helpers

- [`format_word()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/format_word.md)
  : Format table for Word output
- [`format_latex()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/format_latex.md)
  : Format table for LaTeX/PDF output

## Internal Functions

- [`abbreviate_var_name()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/abbreviate_var_name.md)
  : Abbreviate variable name
- [`check_format_dependencies()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/check_format_dependencies.md)
  : Check format-specific dependencies
- [`check_margins_dependencies()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/check_margins_dependencies.md)
  : Check margins dependencies
- [`check_robust_dependencies()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/check_robust_dependencies.md)
  : Check robust SE dependencies
- [`collapse_control_vars()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/collapse_control_vars.md)
  : Collapse control variable rows
- [`deduplicate_control_vars()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/deduplicate_control_vars.md)
  : Remove duplicate control variable rows
- [`easytable-package`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/easytable-package.md)
  : easytable: Create Multi-Format Regression Tables
- [`extract_model_measures()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/extract_model_measures.md)
  : Extract goodness-of-fit measures from a model
- [`format_coefficients()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/format_coefficients.md)
  : Format coefficients with significance stars and standard errors
- [`format_term_labels()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/format_term_labels.md)
  : Format term labels for display
- [`get_first_measure_row()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/get_first_measure_row.md)
  : Get first model statistic row index
- [`get_measure_names()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/get_measure_names.md)
  : Get measure row names
- [`get_measure_row_indices()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/get_measure_row_indices.md)
  : Get indices of model statistic rows
- [`is_package_available()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/is_package_available.md)
  : Check if a package is available
- [`is_supported_model()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/is_supported_model.md)
  : Check if model is supported type
- [`make_unique_labels()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/make_unique_labels.md)
  : Ensure labels are unique via numeric suffix
- [`mark_control_vars()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/mark_control_vars.md)
  : Mark control variables with 'Y' indicator
- [`parse_model()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/parse_model.md)
  : Parse a model and return formatted results
- [`parse_models()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/parse_models.md)
  : Parse multiple models into a combined table
- [`parse_single_model()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/parse_single_model.md)
  : Parse a single statistical model
- [`` `%>%` ``](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/pipe.md)
  : Pipe Operator
- [`separate_measures()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/separate_measures.md)
  : Separate model statistics from coefficients
- [`sort_table()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/sort_table.md)
  : Sort table with control variables last
- [`split_factor_level()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/split_factor_level.md)
  : Detect and split factor level suffix using model metadata
- [`transform_table()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/transform_table.md)
  : Transform parsed model table
- [`validate_control_vars()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/validate_control_vars.md)
  : Validate control variables exist in models
- [`validate_model_list()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/validate_model_list.md)
  : Validate model list input
- [`validate_model_types()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/validate_model_types.md)
  : Validate all models in list are supported types
- [`validate_output_format()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/validate_output_format.md)
  : Validate output format
- [`validate_parameters()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/validate_parameters.md)
  : Validate parameter types
- [`validate_table_size()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/validate_table_size.md)
  : Validate table_size parameter
- [`wrap_interaction_terms()`](https://alfredo-hs.github.io/easytable/reference/wrap_interaction_terms.md)
  : Wrap interaction terms to reduce term-column width
